title.rendered: How Agencies Are Using Account-Based Marketing: An Infographic

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564516199344{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573232122891{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1573232191182{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]More than 60 percent of B2B marketers surveyed said they plan to implement an ABM program within the next year.” – Sirius Decisions

Account-based marketing is a B2B marketing strategy in which an organization compiles key contact data on a clearly defined set of prospects and communicates with individual prospect accounts as markets of one, targeting them in a personalized way.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

We gathered ABM insights from 150+ agencies about:
  • The sweet spot for account-based marketing tactics
  • Real tips agencies can use to get started
  • How marketing automation makes ABM more successful

[/vc_column_text]

What is Account-Based Marketing?
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513809131428{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”]Account-based marketing is a B2B marketing strategy in which an organization compiles key contact data on a clearly defined set of prospects and communicates with individual prospect accounts as markets of one, targeting them in a personalized way.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
